Name: Pandemia: Virus Outbreak
About the game: 2 in 1, Play Become a World Leader mode or Create Vaccine mode. World Leader Mode: Swipe cards to face the deadly virus threat in this story driven strategy game. Step into the world where you will make decisions that world leaders make in the event of a deadly virus threat. Remember, every decision has itâ€™s instant or postponed consequences. Use a strategic map to influence your decisions to manage the virus outbreak. Manage your finances, people mood and virus research to make balanced decisions. Create Vaccine Mode: Become a Scientist and create a Vaccine in this arcade puzzle solver mode. Match Nucleobases into Nucleotides and try to get the highest score. Finish increasingly hard levels in this infinite puzzle mode. ---- If you see any bug in the game, feel free to send me an email. If you feel you are capable of translating the game content to another language contact us by email. ----
